name: Introduction to Journalism
description: A course introducing students to the fundamentals of journalism, including writing, interviewing, and research techniques.

name: Writing for the Media
description: A course teaching students how to write for various forms of media, including print, television, and radio.

name: Mass Media and Society
description: A course exploring the role of the media in our society and its impact on culture, politics, and economics.

name: History of Journalism
description: A course examining the history of journalism from ancient times to the present.
